name: GlobeMetal Industr
overview:
Established in the year 1984, we, “Globe Metal Industries”, are a renowned firm engaged in manufacturing and supplying high grade Canteen Equipment, Hospital Furniture, Domestic Furniture and Office Furniture. In addition to these we offer, Plastic Disposable Product, Industrial Cooler, Sheet Metal Component, Ice Cream Packaging and Canteen Trolley. All these are manufactured using premium quality raw material that is sourced from reliable vendors in this industry.

Our Team: We are blessed with a team of highly skilled professionals who work in sync with one another to carry out all our business activities with ease. All our appointed professionals are highly qualified and hold immense expertise in their respective fields.

Our Infrastructure: We have established a modernized infrastructure facility for our firm, to have a trouble-free execution of all our business activities. This infrastructure is divided into different segments that includes a manufacturing, quality testing and warehousing unit. Our manufacturing unit is installed with high grade machines and equipment that enables us in carrying out all the production operations in a harmonized manner.

Our Products: Canteen Equipment, Hospital Furniture, Domestic Furniture and Office Furniture. In addition to these we offer, Plastic Disposable Product, Industrial Cooler, Sheet Metal Component, Ice Cream Packaging and Canteen Trolley.
